WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please read and follow the Posting Guidelines before making a Post.1) This question has been asked and answered multiple times. The Armor from your Black Heart is being averaged.
WorkItem.Description:
Difference between Armory data and data showing in Rawr with Health and Armor totals. My current armory and in game stats for my warrior shows 37846hp and 29098 armor, while in Rawr the "unbuffed" numbers are off. Rawr shows 37206 HP and 30239 armor (level 83 target selected). Even more changing the targets level in the options tab to a lower level changes the armor total on the stats tab while unbuffed and buffed. Also the total amount of stamina is also showing a difference between armory/in game and rawr. This information I believe can effect the buffed number for reduction % since while selecting buffs I have in a 10man raid between ingame and rawr are different. Information for said warrior is listed in the steps to recreate this issue. 
 
   1. Launch Rawr
   2. File > Load from armory... 
   3. Character Name: Zeo
       Realm: Greymane
       Region: US      
   4. Tools > Disable all buffs
   5. *Note Armor amount*
   6. Options tab > Change Target Level to 80
   7. Stats tab > Observe the Armor difference
 
# Rawr v2.3.4.0
# Windows XP PRO SP3

Comments.Message: 2) The Stam is probably you missing the Toughness buff or some other buff is active on one side where it isn't in the other
